testcase.name: Verify_Cart_Updates_After_Adding_Items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Verify cart updates after adding items given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.528s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.07181s e when User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.243s then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006982s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify_Cart_Updates_After_Removing_Items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Verify cart updates after removing items given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 6.135s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.0748s e when User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.207s when User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.224s when User removes item 'bike light' from the cart ... passed in 1.195s then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006981s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify_Items_And_Navigation_To_Checkout_Page_From_Cart
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.404s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.06982s e when User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.198s when User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.201s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.322s then User verify the items in cart ... passed in 0.006981s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.223s then User should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.01796s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
